mobile.name: snake large
mobile.long_description: A large dreadful snake is at your feet, hissing at you.
mobile.description: It looks hungry.

mobile.name: snake green
mobile.long_description: A small green snake is here, and it doesn't look too friendly...
mobile.description: It looks harmless.

mobile.name: centipede
mobile.long_description: A small centipede is here, making its way across the floor.
mobile.description: It looks completely harmless.

mobile.name: kobold
mobile.long_description: An ugly kobold is here, searching for dinner.
mobile.description: It looks ugly.

mobile.name: orc
mobile.long_description: The orc walks around, looking for someone to kill.
mobile.description: You notice an evil look in its eyes...

mobile.name: orc large
mobile.long_description: A large orc is here, looking really mean.
mobile.description: He looks dreadful.

mobile.name: warrior
mobile.long_description: A tall warrior is here. He has more scars than anyone you have ever seen.
mobile.description: He seems to be a strong, brainless fighter.

mobile.name: warrior
mobile.long_description: A tall warrior is here.
mobile.description: He seems to know his way with weapons.

mobile.name: hobgoblin
mobile.long_description: A small hobgoblin stands here.
mobile.description: The hobgoblin looks quite lost.

mobile.name: snake
mobile.long_description: A brown snake watches you.
mobile.description: The snake looks quite mean.

mobile.name: centipede
mobile.long_description: A white centipede is here.
mobile.description: The centipede doesn't really seem to notice you.

mobile.name: hobgoblin
mobile.long_description: A large hobgoblin is here.
mobile.description: The hobgoblin looks quite dangerous.

mobile.name: orc
mobile.long_description: An orc is here, looking for something (or perhaps someone?) to eat.
mobile.description: Well, he doesn't seem to be friendly.

mobile.name: lion mountain
mobile.long_description: A mountain lion is here, growling at you viciously.
mobile.description: The lion looks very nasty with huge claws and big teeth.

mobile.name: giant hill
mobile.long_description: A hill giant is here, tossing some rocks around.
mobile.description: The hill giant looks like he's about 9 feet tall. By his actions you quickly come to the conclusion that he isn't very intelligent.

mobile.name: mage
mobile.long_description: A small intelligent looking mage is standing here.
mobile.description: His IQ makes almost any normal person look stupid... It looks like he knows his way with magic.

mobile.name: troll
mobile.long_description: A large mean-looking troll is here.
mobile.description: Well, it looks dangerous!

mobile.name: snake
mobile.long_description: A large green snake is here, looks like a guardian for an evil force.
mobile.description: You see a evil creature.

mobile.name: thief
mobile.long_description: A thief is here, all dressed in black.
mobile.description: He seems to be counting a handful of coins. Maybe you ought to count YOUR gold too...

mobile.name: orc ugly
mobile.long_description: A ugly orc is standing here.
mobile.description: It is quite disgusting to look at.

mobile.name: centipede
mobile.long_description: A small harmless centipede is here.
mobile.description: Well it doesn't seem to pay any attention to you.

mobile.name: warrior
mobile.long_description: A human warrior is here. He has a evil grin in his face.
mobile.description: He doesn't look friendly at all...

mobile.name: kobold
mobile.long_description: A green kobold is here.
mobile.description: It looks slimy..
